messageBody:
Sorry for the slow reply.

ThumbScript seems to be input only, I couldn't see a written
representation on the site.

The Moon alphabet looks like a more promising candidate, but it's main
advantage over Braille is the Roman-like symbols.
Perhaps creating an set of exaggerated/simplified Quikscript-like
symbols in the style of the Moon alphabet would work?


I've had a play with the Unicode mapping over the holiday the results
are at http://uk.geocities.com/amd64_hacker/mapping (340K; online) or
http://uk.geocities.com/amd64_hacker/mapping.zip (248K; zipped).

Please excuse the low quality scans of my scribbling. :)

I've moved the characters around so that the letters are in alphabetic
order at the beginning, added the left and right brackets to the symbols
and put in columns for frequency and similar glyphs where applicable.

I'm not quite sure on the order of LOCH, LLAN, EXAMINE and EXCITE.
LOCH/LLAN should come first I think since they're 'proper' letters and
EXAMINE/EXCITE should follow since they're 'labour-saving' letters.

There are probably a couple of dozen things wrong or missing from this
chart, let me know what they are and I'll fix them up.

tinyallen wrote:
>
> Another place to look for a Braille-like solution is ThumbScript.
> http://www.thumbscript.com/ <http://www.thumbscript.com/>
>
> Also there's the Moon Alphabet (or Moon Runes).
> http://www.omniglot.com/writing/moon.htm
> <http://www.omniglot.com/writing/moon.htm>
>
> I'm not promoting either of these, just don't want to see anyone
> starting out in a rut of slavish imitation to Braille.
> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Braille
> <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Braille>
>
> --- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
> <mailto:Read_Alphabet%40yahoogroups.com>, amd64_hacker <amd64_hacker@...>
> wrote:
> > Which dot patterns are easiest to recognise, is there a list anywhere?
> > Has anyone been doing anything with the Quikscript Unicode mapping?
> > I have some free time over Christmas, I'd be happy to do some work on it
> > again.
>
>



___________________________________________________________
